casebody.data:
Vincent RITOLI, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6386. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1931. Vincent Ritoli, in pro. per. Clint W. Ilager, U. S. Atty., and Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, POSTER, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.'

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
